channel.title: Solved
channel.description:
ok, i added pkPoints = 0, under pcPoints and magePoints then copied pcPoints and magePoints in playersave.java and converted it to pkPoints... yes i changed the pkpoints for barrows.
THEN WHEN EVER I LOG OUT, IT RESETS MY CHARECTERS AND NEVER LETS ME ON... i deleted the pkpoints in player.java and playersave.java, then it works fine...

item.title: Solved
item.dc:creator: @chaosplaya09 chaosplaya09
item.description:
@chaosplaya09 wrote:

OMG… why… i tried 12 but it did not work… but now it worked… THX

Read full topic

item.title: Solved
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

characterfile.write("pk-points = ", 0, 12);

Use that instead of:
characterfile.write("pk-points = ", 0, 13);

You only have 12 characters in "pk-points = " not 13

Read full topic

then copied pcPoints and magePoints in playersave.java and converted it to pkPoints…
